FuncDef:
The m-lag ip address command configures an IPv4 address dedicated for OSPF/BGP over M-LAG.
The undo m-lag ip address command deletes an IPv4 address dedicated for OSPF/BGP over M-LAG. The m-lag ip address command configures an IPv4 address dedicated for OSPF/BGP over M-LAG. The undo m-lag ip address command deletes an IPv4 address dedicated for OSPF/BGP over M-LAG. By default, the M-LAG IP address is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a mask length.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 32.

Specifies a mask.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Configures an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: You can run the m-lag ip address command to configure an IPv4 address dedicated for OSPF or BGP over M-LAG.
